greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integer solutions to a^2 + b^2 + c^2 + 4*d^2 = n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Olivia X. M. Yao, Ernest X. W. Xia, Combinatorial proofs of five formulas of Liouville, Discrete Math. 318 (2014), 1--9. MR3141622.
formula: G.f.: theta_3(q)^3*theta_3(q^4), where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 01 2018
maple: s:=n-> if whattype(n) = integer then sigma(n) else 0; fi;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 14 2014
